manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) NOT NULL, `weid` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `starttime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `endtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `hd_intro` text, `dj_intro` text, `bg_img` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `bg_color` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `bg_music` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `cp_text` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `ppt1` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ppt2` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `bottom_ad` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `bottom_ad_url` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `follow_url` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `copyright` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `new_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `new_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `new_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `help_follow_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `join_follow_enable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `follow_dlg_tip` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `follow_btn_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `share_bg` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `user_limit` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `user_award_limit` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `index_show_win` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `exchangeEnable` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_address` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qid` int(10) NOT NULL, `box_img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `box_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `kw_bg` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `btn_kw_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `btn_kw_img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `kb_help_count` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_firend` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `rid` int(10) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `headimgurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=800 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_prize` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qid` int(10) NOT NULL, `aid` int(10) NOT NULL, `pname` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `pcount` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `percent` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `displayorder` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ptype` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `jf` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=47 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_record` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qid` int(10) NOT NULL, `aid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uid` int(10) NOT NULL, `help_count` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `pid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `djcreatetime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `ip` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=380 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_setting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) NOT NULL, `appid` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `appsecret` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_mon_qmwb_user` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uopenid` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `qid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uname` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `tel` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `headimgurl` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT '0', `ip` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=203 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
